.. _`cs-web-components-base-table.treeview.index.__module__`:

====================
table/treeview/index
====================

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



Display the table rows hierarchically. It turns a specific column into tree view.
It can be toggled between tree table and a normal table.

React Properties
----------------
This feature defines some more props for the table component:

+-----------------------+----------------+------------------+-------------------------------------------+
| Property              | Type           | Default          | Use                                       |
+=======================+================+==================+===========================================+
| treeColumnID          | string         | \-               | Which column should be used to display    |
|                       |                |                  | as tree view                              |
+-----------------------+----------------+------------------+-------------------------------------------+
| treeNodes             | list           | false            | Top level tree nodes with nested          |
|                       |                |                  | information of children nodes             |
+-----------------------+----------------+------------------+-------------------------------------------+
| onToggleTreeView      | func           | \-               | Function to be called when the tree view  |
|                       |                |                  | is toggled on/off.                        |
+-----------------------+----------------+------------------+-------------------------------------------+
